channel.title: DanWord v1.0 | By Daniel. C
channel.description:
DanWord is a free rich text editing document that contains many features. It was created in Delphi, by a person named Daniel. C (a.k.a Dan's The Man or IP-Drowner) and this project was his very third project in Delphi. In some ways, it is similar to Microsoft Word and in some ways not. For example, it doesn't support as many colours as Microsoft Word does but DanWord provides the current Mouse Position as Microsoft Word doesn't.
It is a program created by me, so please provide as much feedback as possible so i can get it all sorted out. More features soon-to-come in later versions, such as saving and more ;)
Enjoy.
[b]Updated: Hopefully fixed a bug, where you type a key and the Manual will open.[/b]
[url=http://pwnds.info/download.php?f=100]Download Here (PWNDS.INFO)[/url]

jay689:

I cant see a reason to see this over Microsoft word - However, for a 3rd project, and remember Microsoft Worrd was probably made by 100’s off peoples ideas all together, all working on it, this guys on his own, so stop slagging him off, he’s done well, least hes setting higher ambitions for himself rather than sticking to something he’s already good at.

Little late maybe?

item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“IP-Drowner, post:20, topic:223593”][quote author=jme link=topic=293707.msg2382972#msg2382972 date=1218646246]

Wow. thisis quite good. i fail at programming. best im at is SCAR. so i pretty much fail. BTW, bowserjr, i would like you to see you make a better one. good job IP-Drowner.

Umm, thanks.
[/quote]Do you even know what “All rights reserved” means xD.

He sort of used it correctly, though it’s still un-needed and he was probably just trying to feel special by putting it in.

I don’t even think this could be copyrighted. There’s probably a million clones of this program.

Feel special? Why would i want to do that? And this community is quite shit due to the fact that no one gives hardly anyone else respect![/quote]We would give you respect if you earned it.

item.title: DanWord v1.0 | By Daniel. C
item.dc:creator: @IP-Drowner IP-Drowner
item.description:
@IP-Drowner wrote:

[quote=“bowserjr2, post:8, topic:223593”][quote author=IP-Drowner link=topic=293707.msg2367068#msg2367068 date=1218004469]
STFU, i’ll be adding more soon. Just be patient. Plus this is just what is necessary for a simple word processor. Maybe compliments are better than criticism? I’d like to see you make a program like this. Also, this is my third ever program made with Delphi!
[/quote]
Should I said what you should do with your program?
Give it something that non other program has and the feature have to be used to something the user need.
Like a Graph Plotter build in word/excel/Writter/Calc would be great. (If that exist, please tell me about it.)[/quote]
Meh, i’m only a beginner. I’ll lay off the advanced stuff until i get better
